description:
Sherrice is an orphan Alter-user who works for HOLY alongside Ryuu Hou. Her Alter power is the ability to heal the wounds of others, but at a cost; she has to expend her own life energy. This is not a problem for minor wounds.
Because of her overwhelming love for Ryuu, she ultimately sacrifices her own life energy to save Ryuu after a battle that should have killed him.
name: Sherrice Adjani
